description: Connections containing access tokens for the Red Hat Ansible app. This connection can be used for connecting to Red Hat Ansible Automation Controller as well as the open-source project AWX.
displayName: Red Hat Ansible Automation Controller Connections

constraints.customMessage: Name has to be between 1 and 50 characters long

name.description: A unique and clearly identifiable connection name.

constraints.customMessage: Token has to be between 1 and 100 characters long

token.description: API access token for the Ansible Automation Controller. Please note that this token is not refreshed and can expire.

type.description: Type of authentication method that should be used.

constraints.customMessage: URL has to be between 1 and 255 characters long

url.description: URL of the Ansible Automation Controller API endpoint. For example, https://ansible.yourdomain.com/api/v2/

schemaConstraints.customMessage: A connection with the same name already exists. Please provide a different name.
